casebody.data:
SELECT THEATRES CORPORATION, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. James W. JOHNSON, Collector of Internal Revenue, Defendant-Appellee. No. 19, Docket 24447. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued Nov. 12, 1957. Decided Dec. 3, 1957. Victor R. Wolder, New York City, for plaintiff-appellant. Morton S. Robson, Asst. U. S. Atty., S.D.N.Y., New York City (Paul W. Williams, U. S. Atty., New York City, on the brief), for defendant-appellee.

Before CLARK, Chief Judge, MOORE, Circuit Judge, and LEIBELL, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed on the opinion of District Judge Bicks, D.C.S.D.N.Y., 145 F.Supp. 583.
